/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a vibrant street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is adorned with lush green trees and bushes, providing a refreshing contrast to the urban landscape. A red car is parked on the side of the road, adding a pop of color to the scene. People can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day, contributing to the dynamic atmosphere of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, indicating a sunny day, which illuminates the scene with natural light and enhances the overall visibility of the objects and people in the image.
